name: Social Circle
shortDesc: jQuery Plugin for building animated circular navigation
overViewHTML:
A simple jQuery plugin that creates an animated navigation menu that can be expanded or collapsed by clicking on a center icon. I wanted to try out the process of creating a jQuery plugin with customizable settings and a project of this scope seemed like a good fit. The plugin's settings can be customized in the following ways:

  • rotate: determines the starting placement of the icons.
  • radius determines how far the icons appear from the center of the circle in pixels.
  • circleSize: determines what portion of the circumference of a circle is used.
  • Speed: changes the animation speed of the icons.
